General.Name: Europejskie Centrum Odszkodowań SA
General.Description: Europejskie Centrum Odszkodowan S.A. supports people injured in accidents and their relatives in obtaining compensation from insurance companies in Poland, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, and Romania. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Legnica, Poland.
General.Address: ul. Sw. M. Kolbe 18, Legnica, Poland, 59-220
